text.tspan: As you sailed across the vast ocean, the rhythmic crashing of waves
against the hull filled the air. The journey had been long, but at last, a
distant strip of land appeared on the horizon. Hope surged through you
as you adjusted the ship’s course, eager to set foot on solid ground again.
However, as you drew closer, the water suddenly turned treacherous.
Jagged rocks lurked just beneath the surface, hidden by the foaming
waves.
Before you could react, a violent jolt shook the ship as it slammed
into the rocks. The sound of splintering wood echoed all around you.
The vessel groaned under the impact, and within moments, it began to
break apart, claimed by the relentless sea. You fought desperately to stay
afloat, clinging to a piece of the wreckage as the current tossed you
toward the shore.
When you finally crawled onto the beach, exhausted and soaked to the
bone, you realized you were alone. The once-mighty ship was gone,
swallowed by the ocean. Scanning the wreckage that had washed ashore,
you managed to salvage only a few items: an axe, three sturdy logs, and
a single piece of bread—hardly enough to survive. With nothing but an
unknown land ahead and the vast ocean behind, you knew you had to act
fast if you wanted to stay alive.
Press any where to leave
Back story:
instructions are in inventory
